article_title: Is The Obama IRS Threatening To Ignore A Court Order?

article_metadata.description: Government lawyers seem to be suggesting the IRS will keep issuing subsidies and imposing taxes in federal Exchanges even if the courts declare it has no authority to do so.
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: Government lawyers seem to be suggesting the IRS will keep issuing subsidies and imposing taxes in federal Exchanges even if the courts declare it has no authority to do so.
og.title: Halbig v. Sebelius: Is The Obama IRS Threatening To Ignore A Court Order?
